ygData.subject: More lavastorm..
ygData.msgSnippet: just some more lavastorm chat... basklisks.. i can handle these pretty much.. unless something else jumps in.. (like an elemental).. they paralyze either you
ygData.messageBody:
just some more lavastorm chat...

basklisks.. i can handle these pretty much.. unless something else jumps in..
(like an elemental).. they paralyze either you or your pet.. leaving the other
free to attack.. they're not high on hps.. a few dots will kill them easy
enough

my current spell lineup: lifedraw, poison bolt (my opener), engulfing
darkness, vamp embrace, fear (does it work? i haven't tried it yet), convoke
shadows, gate, lesser shielding..

a blue pet is a must.. greens just don't hack it.. and even blues die a lot,
bring along a lot of chips..

the scenery and music is pretty cool.. sunrise/set is nice to watch..

there is never just one elemental around.. if you attack him, friends will
show up fast..
